snippet.title: Soulstice - Trailer Breakdown/Developer Interview
snippet.description:
Luke chats with members of Reply Game Studios (Creative Director Fabio Pagetti and Product Manager Samuele Perseo), the team behind Soulstice to dive deeper into the game's inspirations, unique gameplay, and more. Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1602080/Soulstice/

Follow Us on Twitter: http://modus.games/twitter 
Like Us on Facebook: http://modus.games/facebook 
Join our Discord: http://modus.games/discord
